name: Emagineers
description:
We are a committed team of digital experts delivering solutions for local and international clients. We’re driven by building better software, by collaborating closely with clients to exploit technology for a competitive edge. Whether you're starting web construction or require development of your existing infrastructure, Emagineers can help. Our experienced consultants are passionate about achieving technical excellence and delivering high performance web applications that deliver ROI.
Specialising in open source technologies such as PHP and Javascript, we provide Development, Consultancy, Training and Support to enterprises and public organisations. As leading E-commerce experts, we also build and integrate high performance online stores using the industry software Magento. Our team design, develop and support solutions that focus on maximising your revenue and that compliment your creative visions. 
 
READ MORE...
